```{r}

library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolygons(data = macleish_layers[["research"]], color = "red") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(data = macleish_layers[["challenge_courses"]], color = "red") %>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_layers[["trails"]], color = "brown", weight = 1) %>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_layers[["streams"]], color = "blue", weight = 1) %>%
  addPolygons(data = macleish_layers[["boundary"]], stroke = TRUE, color = "black", fill = NA, weight = 2, opacity = 2) %>%
  addPolygons(data = macleish_layers[["forests"]], color = "green", weight = 1, fill = NA) %>%
  addPolygons(data = macleish_layers[["wetlands"]], color = "blue", weight = 1)
```
